article.Heading: GST Rates Finder: A GST app launched by government of India
article.Summary: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley along with CBEC officials launched an app called the 'GST Rates Finder'.
article.Body:
At a time when some segments of the business community are talking of teething troubles - the government has introduced an app to make Goods and Services Tax (GST) easy to understand. Finance Minister Arun Jaitley along with CBEC officials launched an app called the 'GST Rates Finder'. CNBC-TV18'S Timsy Jaipuria caught up CBEC Chief Vanaja Sarna and Sandeep Rawal, the CBEC Officer who invented this application.

Watch video for more...
